job_tasks.phrase: state-of-the-art recommender system in an industrial setting
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the objective of building a sophisticated system within a business context, implying a need to understand industrial requirements.

soft_skills.phrase: connecting people from widely diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and geographies

eBay Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status, and disability, or other legally protected status.

classification.rationale: The job description is heavily focused on company benefits, diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunity rather than specific technical responsibilities. While it mentions building a 'recommender system', it lacks the depth of technical tasks, technologies, or AI-specific methodologies required to classify it as an ML or GenAI Engineer role.
